com.linecorp.armeria.common

Class Flags

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.common.Flags

  • public final class Flags
extends Object
    The system properties that affect Armeria's runtime behavior.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int defaultBackoffMaxAttempts()
      Returns the default value of the defaultBackoffMaxAttempts parameter when instantiating a RetryingClient and its subtypes.

      Returns the default value of the initialDelayMillis parameter when instantiating a Backoff using Backoff.exponential(long, long).

      Returns the default value of the SessionOption.USE_HTTP1_PIPELINING option.

      Returns whether the JNI-based /dev/epoll socket I/O is enabled.

      Returns whether the JNI-based TLS support with OpenSSL is enabled.

      Returns whether the verbose exception mode is enabled.

    • Method Detail

      • verboseExceptions

        public static boolean verboseExceptions()
        Returns whether the verbose exception mode is enabled. When enabled, the exceptions frequently thrown by Armeria will have full stack trace. When disabled, such exceptions will have empty stack trace to eliminate the cost of capturing the stack trace.

        This flag is disabled by default. Specify the -Dcom.linecorp.armeria.verboseExceptions=true JVM option to enable it.

      • useEpoll

        public static boolean useEpoll()
        Returns whether the JNI-based /dev/epoll socket I/O is enabled. When enabled on Linux, Armeria uses /dev/epoll directly for socket I/O. When disabled, java.nio socket API is used instead.

        This flag is enabled by default for supported platforms. Specify the -Dcom.linecorp.armeria.useEpoll=false JVM option to disable it.

      • useOpenSsl

        public static boolean useOpenSsl()
        Returns whether the JNI-based TLS support with OpenSSL is enabled. When enabled, Armeria uses OpenSSL for processing TLS connections. When disabled, the current JVM's default SSLEngine is used instead.

        This flag is enabled by default for supported platforms. Specify the -Dcom.linecorp.armeria.useOpenSsl=false JVM option to disable it.

      • defaultUseHttp2Preface

        public static boolean defaultUseHttp2Preface()
        Returns the default value of the SessionOption.USE_HTTP2_PREFACE option. Note that this value has effect only if a user did not specify the SessionOption.USE_HTTP2_PREFACE option.

        This flag is disabled by default. Specify the -Dcom.linecorp.armeria.defaultUseHttp2Preface=true to enable it.

      • defaultUseHttp1Pipelining

        public static boolean defaultUseHttp1Pipelining()
        Returns the default value of the SessionOption.USE_HTTP1_PIPELINING option. Note that this value has effect only if a user did not specify the SessionOption.USE_HTTP1_PIPELINING option.

        This flag is enabled by default. Specify the -Dcom.linecorp.armeria.defaultUseHttp1Pipelining=false to disable it.

      • defaultBackoffMaxAttempts

        public static int defaultBackoffMaxAttempts()
        Returns the default value of the defaultBackoffMaxAttempts parameter when instantiating a RetryingClient and its subtypes. Note that this value has effect only if a user did not specify the defaultBackoffMaxAttempts in the constructor call.

        The default value of this flag is . Specify the -Dcom.linecorp.armeria.defaultBackoffMaxAttempts=<integer> to override the default value.

      • defaultExponentialBackoffInitialDelayMillis

        public static int defaultExponentialBackoffInitialDelayMillis()
        Returns the default value of the initialDelayMillis parameter when instantiating a Backoff using Backoff.exponential(long, long). Note that this value has effect only if a user did not specify the defaultExponentialBackoffInitialDelayMillis in the constructor call.

        The default value of this flag is . Specify the -Dcom.linecorp.armeria.defaultExponentialBackoffInitialDelayMillis=<integer> to override the default value.
